thread.title: A Fashion Trend Made by Airwheel adults electric scooters
thread.title_full: A Fashion Trend Made by Airwheel adults electric scooters

title: A Fashion Trend Made by Airwheel adults electric scooters
text: A Fashion Trend Made by Airwheel adults electric scooters Airwheel, however, leading the fashion of transportation by its state-of-the-art technology and fashionable appearance, fulfill customers’ needs with various models. United States, 21 October 2015 -- After the London Fashion Week and the New York Fashion Week, people chase a fashionable feeling not only on clothes, but also on transports. When it comes to the transports, bus, subway, private car, or even bike will dawn on people’s mind. However, we have already felt tired of these traditional ones. Airwheel intelligent scooter now changes everything. Airwheel electric self-balancing scooter , featuring the low-carbon emission, is the newest and environmentally friendly vehicle. A technology product leads the fashion trend as well. Airwheel, representing the modern technology, beautiful design and powerful engine, takes the lead role in both technology and fashion. As a modern technology product, Airwheel investigates customers’ need and provides them with intelligent scooters with diverse shape and functions. The classic unicycle X series are designed to people who love adventure, because of its powerful engine and strong battery. The Airwheel-made twin-wheel Q series has an exquisite look and is easy to learn, especially designed for women. Airwheel A3, with the sitting-posture mode, is a perfect transport for city commuter who lives far away from their companies. Airwheel S5, another new product of 2015, is designed for cross-country lovers, which has no problem of going up and down stairs.All the Airwheel electric scooter s are outfitted with the most advanced intelligent chip in the world. The chip adopts the state-of-the-art intelligent system with theory of flight control, Fuzzy Algorithm and gyroscope to stay balanced. A simple turn of users’ body could help them to handle the scooter. This chip, including its technology and algorithm, is the cornerstone of Airwheel and lead Airwheel to move further. As the company is making breakthrough again and again, one day, hopefully, Airwheel would create an astonishing platform for users to show their intelligence of the vehicle and their understanding of fashion. Airwheel intelligent scooter is a treasure for fashion. Everyone likes Airwheel intelligent scooter. For fashion, for our environment, for high technology, let’s choose Airwheel. # # #
